valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 978 expected Viking 995 by 1800 Thursday. New low expected 125 miles west of Rockall 992 by same time. New high expected Trafalgar 1021 by that time

Wind
Southeasterly 4 to 6, veering southwesterly 5 to 7, increasing gale 8 for a time, then veering westerly 4 to 6 later.
Sea state
Moderate becoming rough, then occasionally very rough later.
Weather
Rain or showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good.

In southeast, good. In northwest, good occasionally poor.
